name: Plus for Trello
details:
**[Plus for Trello](http://www.plusfortrello.com) is free since 2013!** 
**Add card Points, Spent, Estimates.** 
Also works on mobile and offline.  
  
The Chrome extension has much more: timers, counts, charts, reports, scrum, burn-downs, projected end dates.
